mapper.select: select * from (select * from musicboard_article ORDER BY article_no desc) where ROWNUM <= 1
select musicboard_article.*, (select count(*) from musicboard_comment where musicboard_comment.article_no= #{articleNo}) as comment_count from musicboard_article where article_no = #{articleNo}

select * from ( select rownum as rnum, A.article_no, A.id, A.title, A.text, A.file_name from ( select article_no, id, title, text, file_name from musicboard_article order by article_no desc ) A where rownum <= #{end}) B where B.rnum >= #{start}
select read_count from musicboard_article where article_no = #{articleNo}
select nvl(max(article_no), 0) from(select * from musicboard_article where article_no < #{articleNo})
select nvl(min(article_no), 0) from(select * from musicboard_article where article_no > #{articleNo})
mapper.update: update musicBoard_article set read_count = #{readCount} where article_no = #{articleNo}
